medi:segment.name: ST
medi:segment.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and assign a control number

medi:segment.name: BHT
medi:segment.description: To define the business hierarchical structure of the transaction set and identify the business application purpose and reference data, i.e., number, date, and time

medi:segment.name: HL
medi:segment.description: To identify dependencies among the content of hierarchically related groups of data segments

medi:segment.name: NM1
medi:segment.description: To supply the full name of an individual or organizational entity

medi:segment.name: TRN
medi:segment.description: To uniquely identify a transaction to an application

medi:segment.name: DTP
medi:segment.description: To specify any or all of a date, or a time period

medi:segment.name: STC
medi:segment.description: To report the status, required action, and paid information of a claim or service line

medi:segment.description: To specify quantity information
